channel.title: A question about players
channel.description:
Hey, I am working on my server, and eventually it will have multiple "worlds" so I want to know how I can keep the players syncronized? I know that most probably use a MySQL Database, Can anyone find a tutorial for that? I have searched multiple forums and have not :(
Any help is appreciated, Thanks.

item.description:

M00 M00 Pk Wanna Help Me With My Server ? Im New And You Seem Good, Clever And Experienced

item.title: A question about players
item.dc:creator: @M00_M00_Pk M00 M00 Pk
item.description:
@M00_M00_Pk wrote:

He wants to set up 2 or more servers, but let the characters on either server, without data being lost.

E.G, One person logs on server 1, but wants to go on server 2, so he goes on server 2, and the data he got in server one is also on server 2.

If you get my drift.

Its Defeinately MySQL Related, but i suck at that since i was a DB Developer on a wow private server.

Read full topic
